name: Blog Post Structure & Coverage
scope_note: Structural and quantitative guidance for long-form content
purpose: Define how content should be structured and scoped to meet modern search expectations without relying on outdated SEO formulas. All numeric ranges are guidance only and never optimization targets.
overriding_principle: Completeness, clarity, and usefulness always override counts, ranges, or formulas.

1_blog_post_length.description: Word count ranges based on topic complexity.
considerations: Whether all reasonable sub-questions are answered
prohibitions: Writing long posts to hit a number
Forcing ultimate-guide length for simple queries
1_blog_post_length.rule_of_thumb: If removing 20% of the content does not reduce value, the post is too long.

2_primary_keyword_usage.description: Use the main keyword naturally and sparingly.
typical_usage: A few times naturally in the body
considerations: Search engines understand topics, not repetition
The keyword should feel inevitable, not forced
prohibitions: Repeating the keyword in every heading
2_primary_keyword_usage.rule_of_thumb: If the keyword is removed and the article still makes sense, usage is correct.

3_secondary_keywords.description: Secondary keywords act as section drivers, not fillers.
considerations: Secondary keywords reflect related user questions
Often sourced from PAA, related searches, or internal data
3_secondary_keywords.rule_of_thumb: Each secondary keyword must add information, not decorate text.

4_synonyms_semantic_variation.description: Use natural language variation focused on concepts, not word swapping.
considerations: Modern search systems understand meaning clusters
4_synonyms_semantic_variation.rule_of_thumb: If a human would not consciously vary the phrase, do not.

5_ideal_section_structure.description: Recommended modern structure for informational and AI-eligible content.

sections.name: Practical Implications
requirements: What this means for the reader

6_heading_strategy.description: Headings should clearly communicate what is answered.

7_lists_tables_formatting.description: Use structured formatting where it improves clarity.
best_practices: Lists for steps, factors, and comparisons
Tables for pros and cons or side-by-side differences
prohibitions: Hiding key answers inside long paragraphs

8_internal_content_balance.description: Maintain educational focus in informational posts.
prohibitions: Turning blog posts into landing pages

9_media_usage.description: Media should clarify meaning when helpful.

10_metrics_not_to_track.description: Outdated optimization metrics that must not be used.

11_format_compliance_structural_consiste.description: Respect the requested output format and apply structure consistently.
best_practices: Apply headings, lists, and spacing consistently
Ensure formatting supports clarity and downstream use
prohibitions: Mixing formats in the same output

12_keyword_coverage_conceptual_mapping.description: Keywords represent concepts to be meaningfully addressed, not repetition targets.
best_practices: Map each keyword to a meaningful idea or section
Introduce keywords only where contextually relevant
prohibitions: Forcing keywords into headings or sentences
Treating keyword lists as writing prompts
